text: The Essential Mariah Carey is a greatest hits album by American singer- songwriter Mariah Carey. The album was released on January 7, 2011. ==Track listing== ===UK and Ireland Edition=== ==Track listing== ===US Edition=== ==Charts== Chart Peak position US Billboard R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums 42 ==Release history== Country Date Format Label Catalogue Ireland January 7, 2011 CD, digital download Sony Music 88697832672 United Kingdom January 10, 2011 CD, digital download 88697832672 United States May 8, 2012 CD, digital download ==References== Category:Mariah Carey albums Category:2011 albums Category:Pop albums Category:Soul albums Category:R&B; albums
title: The Essential Mariah Carey
